Introduction

NTX is an eight-member boy group under Victory Company. Originally as ten, they debuted on March 30th, 2021, with their mini album Full of Lovescapes.

The members of NTX are Hyeongjin, Yunhyeok, Xiha, Changhun, Hojun, Rawhyun, Eunho, and Seongwon.

Their group name "NTX" originally meant "Neo Tracks No.X" as X was the Roman numeral for 10, representing the number of members.

Their fandom name is NTFUL, a combination of "NTX" and "Beautiful." It represents the beauty of the moments shared between NTX and their fans.

On November 6, 2022, Victory Company announced that Member Gihyun decided to leave the group due to personal reasons.

On December 11, 2024, Victory Company announced that Member Jiseong left the group and the agency due to differences in the direction in which either party wanted to go.
